description: A `create*Query()` method must look like `return Spy*Query::create();`. `Spryker\Zed\SalesStatistics\Persistence\SalesStatisticsPersistenceFactory::createSalesOrderQuery()` violates this rule.
A `create*Query()` method must look like `return Spy*Query::create();`. `Spryker\Zed\SalesStatistics\Persistence\SalesStatisticsPersistenceFactory::createSalesOrderItemQuery()` violates this rule.
